forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 66. West wind 3 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 53. West northwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with a bright and sunny disposition, inviting all who venture outside to savor its charm. The skies are mostly clear, revealing the city’s stunning architecture and the long stretches of blue beyond, where the Golden Gate Bridge gracefully punctuates the horizon. A mild west wind wafts through the streets, adding a gentle touch to the warm embrace of a high near sixty-six degrees. Residents can expect this clarity to persist through the evening, as temperatures dip to a comfortable fifty-three under the protective cloak of clear skies.

There is little sign of the infamous fog, which usually lingers at the edges of the Bay, allowing the sunlit city to shine in full splendour today. It’s an ideal moment to don light layers—perhaps a breezy shirt or a light jacket that can be removed when the sun peaks highest. Afternoon strolls through Golden Gate Park or a leisurely coffee at an outdoor café would be the perfect way to bask in the day’s gentle warmth. As sunset approaches, the clarity of the evening will lend itself superbly to a quiet dinner al fresco, where the fading light dances on the waters of the Bay. This day, crafted by the weather and the spirit of the city, beckons all to take a step outside and relish in its beauty and tranquility.
